professional: Web design | Mobile design | UI/UX improvment

description: - I excel in crafting visually appealing and responsive WordPress and Shopify websites that are fully functional.
- I specialize in converting PSD, Figma, XD, and Sketch designs into dynamic websites using platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, and HTML.
- I possess extensive proficiency in popular page builders including Elementor, Divi, WP Bakery Page Builder, and Visual Composer.
- With a wealth of expertise spanning over 5 years, I have a strong background in Web and Graphic Design
- Creating impactful landing pages is one of my key strengths.
- Handling WordPress maintenance, making edits, and resolving issues are areas where I bring my expertise.

Located in Aachen, this technical university is renowned for its expertise in engineering, especially in areas like mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, and computer science.

overview: 1. With 5+ years of expertise, I am an expert web developer specializing in WordPress, Square Space, Wix, and Shopify.
